page.title: 06WESTON HALL
page.content: {WESTON HALL}is a 16th CENTURY MANOR HOUSE of Bulkington.It has 32 bedrooms 4 bars and 2 rooms for conferences and other special things.Most of the bedrooms are double and they all have a bath room.They also have a colour television and a coffee maker.A single room ,shower and suite is Â£24:50 a double room,shower and suite is Â£35:00 per night. All these prices include full English breakfast newspaper and V.A.T at 15%.Bed and Breakfast for a single room is Â£17:50 and a double room is Â£26.Here are some of the snacks you can have: deep fried scampi,pizza a la roma,two kebabs,soup of the day,plough mans lunch,jacket potato,ocean sticks,beefburger.{ {WESTON HALL}is very interesting.
